main.profile_description:
I am a hardworking and dedicated DevOps professional, proficient in Python, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
 With a strong focus on organization and a proactive, punctual approach, I thrive in a team-oriented environment.

experiences.title: JUNIOR BUSINESS ANALYST/IT SUPPORT
experiences.description: As a Junior Business Analyst at PROFESSIONAL OUTSOURCING SOLUTIONS LTD, I honed my data analysis and research skills. I collaborated with senior analysts, generated insightful reports. My contributions to cross-functional projects reinforced my passion for data-driven strategies and enhanced my problem-solving skills.

experiences.title: IT SUPPORT/DEVOPS
experiences.description: As an IT Support Technician and DevOps specialist at Aphelion Solutions Ltd, I delivered essential technical support, resolved IT challenges, and ensured operational stability. Within the DevOps team, I streamlined deployments, automated tasks, and improved system reliability. This dual role provided me with a comprehensive grasp of IT support and technical operations.
